official_title: To establish a market based pricing mechanism for deposit insurance and offer depositors the option of purchase amounts in excess of $100,000, and for other purposes.
short_title: Deposit Insurance Improvement and Taxpayer Protection Act of 1991

summary.text: Deposit Insurance Improvement and Taxpayer Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to authorize insured depository institutions to offer depositors the option to purchase deposit insurance for amounts in excess of $100,000. Directs the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to solicit competitive bids from private insurance companies for such coverage.

titles.title: Deposit Insurance Improvement and Taxpayer Protection Act of 1991
To establish a market based pricing mechanism for deposit insurance and offer depositors the option of purchase amounts in excess of $100,000, and for other purposes.
